memberSignatures.value: public string Write (Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema, bool canonical = false, System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary<string,Chr.Avro.Abstract.NamedSchema> names = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Write(class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema, bool canonical, class System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary`2<string, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.NamedSchema> names) cil managed

parameters.name: canonical
parameters.summary:
Whether the schema should be written in Parsing Canonical Form (i.e., without
            nonessential attributes).

parameters.name: names
parameters.summary:
An optional schema cache. The cache is populated as the schema is written and can be
            used to determine which named schemas have already been processed.
